entry.title: Dustin Wolf (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Dustin Wolf (pictured) has been named his league's goaltender of the year the last four years in a row?

entry.title: Tychon missile (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the British Tychon missile was developed from a Barnes Wallis concept to keep strike aircraft safe while dropping nuclear bombs?

entry.title: Yurie Igoma (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that voice actress Yurie Igoma considers Mickey Mouse to be her mentor?

entry.title: Transition (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that in the documentary Transition, Jordan Bryon says he finds Taliban fighters "lovely"?

entry.title: Emelia Quinn (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Emelia Quinn argues that "monstrous vegans" have recurred in literature since Mary Shelley's Frankenstein?

entry.title: Witch Fire (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that as a result of the Witch Fire almost 1 million people had to evacuate Southern California?

entry.title: Liber ad amicum (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that in Liber ad amicum, Bonizo of Sutri endorses violence against heretics?

entry.title: orange paintbrushes (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that orange paintbrushes are guarded by rufous hummingbirds?
